message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really find valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go quite that low.  Would you consider $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $105. Could we perhaps agree on $100?
